content.p: We are International University of the Year An inspiring research portfolio of £650m Ranked 8th in the UK for research power More than 97% of our research is recognised internationally A member of the prestigious Russell Group of leading UK universities and a founding member of the global Universitas 21 network We are Sports University of the Year The University has been awarded Gold for outstanding teaching and learning We are in the top 30 in the UK’s three major league tables Ranked as a world top 100 university
